mapper.insert: insert into d_member (d_name, d_id, d_pw, d_email1, d_email2, d_email_check, d_zipcode, d_address, d_phone1, d_phone2, d_phone3, d_sms, d_tel1, d_tel2, d_tel3, d_birth_yy, d_birth_mm, d_birth_dd, d_sl) values (#{d_name},#{d_id},#{d_pw},#{d_email1},#{d_email2}, #{d_email_check},#{d_zipcode},#{d_address}, #{d_phone1},#{d_phone2},#{d_phone3}, #{d_sms},#{d_tel1},#{d_tel2},#{d_tel3},#{d_birth_yy},#{d_birth_mm},#{d_birth_dd},#{d_sl})
